page.title: 03ARMED FORCES IN EYKE PARISH
page.content:
Although only the very edge of an establishment to do with the Armed Forces is in this area, the effect of the nearby American Air Force Bases of Woodbridge and Bentwaters are felt in many aspects of life.
The volume of traffic using the roads through the area is greatly increased by service personnel travelling by car, lorry and van between the bases.
Servicemen also like to live off base; three houses in this area are occupied by Americans. During "alerts" local residents are often aware of the extra activity, either by increased aircraft noise or traffic travelling through at unusual times.
